title: Medical Practical Competency Enhancement: Inquiry-Based Science Practical Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic secondary science theories and understanding of experimental principles
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more systematic inquiry questions to solve given scientific problems.
Learners can perform data analysis and interpretation with over 80% accuracy during collaborative inquiry processes using online tools.
Learners can present practical application plans via 15-minute presentations by converting inquiry results into visual materials (e.g., infographics).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
